text: @realDonaldTrump Seven different strains of COVID-19 so becoming reinfected is highly possible.  It can be transfered from dead bodies. We still don't have an accurate test in mass quantities.  We are nowhere near ready to open back up. Why make the worse response in history even more horrific?
